property.name: insertHeatmapQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.heatmap ( heatmap_id, bio_data_item_id, cell_value_type, row_tree_path, column_tree_path, cell_annotation_path, label_annotation_path, max_cell_value, min_cell_value, column_labels, row_labels, cell_values, content, cell_annotation, label_annotation, row_tree, column_tree ) VALUES ( :HEATMAP_ID, :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID, :CELL_VALUE_TYPE, :ROW_TREE_PATH, :COLUMN_TREE_PATH, :CELL_ANNOTATION_PATH, :LABEL_ANNOTATION_PATH, :MAX_CELL_VALUE, :MIN_CELL_VALUE, :COLUMN_LABELS, :ROW_LABELS, :CELL_VALUES, :CONTENT, :CELL_ANNOTATION, :LABEL_ANNOTATION, :ROW_TREE, :COLUMN_TREE )

property.name: loadHeatmapQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.source, b.format, b.created_date, b.bucket_id, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
h.heatmap_id, h.cell_value_type, h.row_tree_path, h.column_tree_path, h.cell_annotation_path, h.label_annotation_path, h.max_cell_value, h.min_cell_value, h.row_labels, h.column_labels, h.cell_values FROM catgenome.heatmap h JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON h.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id WHERE heatmap_id = ?

property.name: loadHeatmapsQuery
property.value:
